description: Request for Proposal - Radiation Meters and Antenna Probes
full_summary:
# Radiation Meters and Antenna Probes Invitation to Bid

## Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-5006-90979429
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: W8486-217955/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: Friday, May 12, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Friday, May 19, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Sunday, September 30, 2023

## Notice Information

The Department of National Defence invites interested bidders to submit proposals for the supply of Radiation Meters and Antenna Probes. The tender is solicited under the funds available for the acquisition of goods and/or services from vendors that are subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Scope of Work

The solicited items include:

### Item 1: Selective Radiation Meter

* Part Number: 3006/101 or equivalent
* National Stock Number (NSN): 6625 20-A0W4472
* Quantity: 2 units (KT)
* Delivery Location: 45 Sacré-Coeur Blvd, Gatineau, QC J8X 1C6

### Item 2: 6 GHz Three-axis, E-field Antenna Probes

* Part Number: 3502/01 or equivalent
* National Stock Number (NSN): 6625 20-A0W4482
* Quantity: 2 units (EA)
* Delivery Location: 45 Sacré-Coeur Blvd, Gatineau, QC J8X 1C6

### Item 3: 3 GHz Three-axis, E-field Antenna Probe

* Part Number: 3501/03 or equivalent
* National Stock Number (NSN): 6625 20-A0W4481
* Quantity: 2 units (EA)
* Delivery Location: 45 Sacré-Coeur Blvd, Gatineau, QC J8X 1C6

### Item 4: 9 kHz to 300 MHz E-field Antenna Probe

* Part Number: 3531/04 or equivalent
* National Stock Number (NSN): 6625 20-A0W4480
* Quantity: 2 units (EA)
* Delivery Location: 45 Sacré-Coeur Blvd, Gatineau, QC J8X
